isopy.dtypes¶

ElementString(string, reformat = True) A string representation of an element.
IsotopeString(string, reformat = True) A string representation of an isotope.
RatioString(string, reformat = True) A string representation of a ratio.
IsotopeList(items = None, reformat = True) A subclass of list specifically for list of IsotopeString items.
RatioList(items = None, reformat = True) A subclass of list specifically for list of RatioString items.
IsopyDict([dictionary, values, keys, …])
IsotopeArray(data, keys = None) A custom view of a structured numpy array storing data with IsotopeString keys.
RatioArray
